summary: Changed mining animation so it runs faster.
descriptionHtml:
Edited the mining animation so it runs at about 3x speed so mining can be done faster.

JJstudios made a video
[youtube]7zfxbY7CDc8[/youtube]

I done the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30837]wood chopping animation[/url] now too

I just unpacked the animation to XML, edited the <hkparam name=\"duration\"> line from 4.6666 to 1.5 and repacked.
author: The Old One
